snippet: Kirsten Flipkens of Belgium moved into the second round of the Miami Open with a 7-6 (4), 6-2 win over Laura Robson of Great Britain on Tuesday....
lead_paragraph: Kirsten Flipkens of Belgium moved into the second round of the Miami Open with a 7-6 (4), 6-2 win over Laura Robson of Great Britain on Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Kirsten Flipkens of Belgium Wins at Miami Open
headline.main: Kirsten Flipkens of Belgium Wins at Miami Open
